name: His Character Demo - Harvest Hero
description:
Arrow Keys - Move                                       Z - Attack                                          X - Pick up Turnip / Put Turnip in Basket

Fill your basket with Turnips, he is hungry! Fight his enemies, they want to steal his juicy, delicious, scrumptious, tantalizing Turnips. He will be joining Harvest Hero as playable character, very good, I like.

!!!!!!!!!!! APRIL FOOLS  !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

We thought we'd make a fun and short gameplay demo for April fools, and entwine some strange stuff into it. We hope you enjoy!

Check out Harvest Hero by following my Twitter or join the community Discord!

Art/Music by Ddooby

Gameplay/Programming by Bombfuse
